returns.balance: the token balance for the account

params.delegatee: The address to delegate votes to.

delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,ui.details: This allows execution by proxy of a delegation, so that signers do not need to pay gas.

params.delegatee: The address to delegate votes to.
params.expiry: The timestamp at which the delegation expires.
params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature.

params.account: The address of the account to get the delegatee for.

returns._0: The address of the delegatee for `account`.

getDelegatorNonce(address).details: Used to prevent replay attacks when delegating by signature.

params.delegator: The address of the delegator to get the nonce for.

params.timestamp: The timestamp to check the total supply of votes at.

returns._0: The total supply of votes available at the last checkpoint before `timestamp`. NOTE: This value is the sum of all available votes, which is not necessarily the sum of all delegated votes. Votes that have not been delegated are still part of total supply, even though they would not participate in a vote.

getVotes(address).details: Returns the current amount of votes that `account` has.

DELEGATION_TYPEHASH().notice: the typehash for the delegation struct

EIP712_TYPEHASH().notice: the typehash for the EIP712 domain separator

balanceOf(address).notice: returns the token balance for an account

clearDelegation().notice: clears the delegation of the sender

delegate(address).notice: Delegates votes from the sender to `delegatee`.

delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Delegates votes from the signer to `delegatee`.

delegates(address).notice: Returns the delegatee that `account` has chosen.

domainSeparatorV4().notice: Returns the EIP712 domain separator for this contract.

getPastTotalSupply(uint256).notice: Returns the total supply of votes available at the end of a past block's timestamp.

getPastVotes(address,uint256).notice: Returns the amount of votes that `account` had at the end of a past block's timestamp.

name().notice: returns the token name for compatibility with EIP-712

version().notice: returns the token symbol for compatibility with EIP-712
